channel.title: What games can my craptop run?
channel.description:
Been looking to play some new games lately.. And the biggest issue is hardware requirements. I get lag on runescape with max settings.. so there's that.
Specs: CPU: Intel Core i3 2350M @2.30GHz Graphics: Intel Chipset 3000 (Yay for integrated piles of shit!) RAM: 6GB Hard Drive: 1TB + 4TB external. OS: Windows 7 Ultimate.
I played League in the past.. But the game was laggy (EUW servers + Shit graphics). And I played one of the Killing Floor games (It had some lag) but that's really about it. Been trying to get a tower pc so I can upgrade it as I go.

item.title: What games can my craptop run?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:7, topic:551821”]Laptops aren’t designed for gaming.

You’d be lucky reaching a constant 50 fps on a private server with those specs

Save up for a desktop[/quote]http://m.newegg.com/Product?itemNumber=N82E16834231374

I beg to differ.

Read full topic
item.source: What games can my craptop run?

item.title: What games can my craptop run?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:8, topic:551821”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=670738.msg4485511#msg4485511 date=1433776498]
Laptops aren’t designed for gaming.

You’d be lucky reaching a constant 50 fps on a private server with those specs

Save up for a desktop
[/quote]
You can most certainly build one or get one that does, regardless if it’s not their main purpose. Alienware does a nice job with doing so.[/quote]

You can, but they are significantly less powerful than a desktop.

Read full topic
item.source: What games can my craptop run?

item.title: What games can my craptop run?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Strucker:

i feel completely ignored…

Your suggestions weren’t. Neither were pure’s.
It’s just that I didn’t think you needed a direct reply saying I was gonna go download the games…
Especially since they’re N64 games, and I actually own a N64… I’ve got both zelda’s and Perfect Dark… That I can find.

[quote=“tyb97, post:12, topic:551821”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=670738.msg4485541#msg4485541 date=1433785329]
if you never played any of impression studios games like pharaoh or zeus they are worth a download
[/quote]
This, Pharaoh was really good.

You have similar specs to my old laptop before it burnt up and I built a PC lol. You can play pretty much any source game, if you haven’t played the portal or half-life series, definitely recommend it. I played games like From The Depths, Kerbal, which were both made in Unity. That laptop ran most Unity based games pretty well except for games like The Forest. I ran some games like some of the NFS’s, and Goat Simulator and such with no problems, and just a few graphical glitches. What type of games are you into?

And then this because you completely ignored it.[/quote]
You probably burnt the laptop out because you were playing games that took too much XD.
I’m more into horror.
Shit like Slenderman is a joke though. That isn’t scary. That’s funny…

Read full topic
item.source: What games can my craptop run?

You have similar specs to my old laptop before it burnt up and I built a PC lol. You can play pretty much any source game, if you haven’t played the portal or half-life series, definitely recommend it. I played games like From The Depths, Kerbal, which were both made in Unity. That laptop ran most Unity based games pretty well except for games like The Forest. item.title: What games can my craptop run?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Justin Bieber:

wow wtf is up with modern hardware if that’s considered a “craptop”… I’ve still got P4s running shit

Because compared to other, even more modern, technology, mine is a pile of shit.

Soulcist:

You can most certainly build one or get one that does, regardless if it’s not their main purpose. Alienware does a nice job with doing so.

fudge alienware. They’re owned by Dell now, and 99% of what you are paying for is the logo.

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:7, topic:551821”]Laptops aren’t designed for gaming.

You’d be lucky reaching a constant 50 fps on a private server with those specs

Save up for a desktop[/quote]
Thank you Sherlock Holmes.
In the mean time… Do you have a suggestion on what I could play whilst I wait?

Miss Silabsoft:

if you never played any of impression studios games like pharaoh or zeus they are worth a download

I’ll have to look for em.

Read full topic

item.title: What games can my craptop run?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551821”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=670738.msg4485018#msg4485018 date=1433449109]
Play on emulators using legal ROMs. Lots of selection and good games, I can recommend you some stuff if you would like.
[/quote]
I used to play emulators for days back in highschool haha. Had that shit on usb and everything.
But yeah man if you wanna give some recommendations I’ll try some.[/quote]N64: Mario Kart 64
Sega Genesis: Streets of Rage 2*, Comix Zone, Golden Axe II*, Revenge of Shinobi, Double Dragon, Mega Bomberman
Sega Mastersystem: Alex Kidd*, Rambo First Blood Pt 2 (lmao)
SNES: Mario Stuff, Super Ghouls’n Ghosts, Kirby’s Dream Land 3, Donkey Kong Stuff, Final Fight

Just some games I like, got them from a list to jog my memory. The astericks signify games I think are very good.

Read full topic
